transcript:
is college a scam well let's see since
the 1990s the average college graduate
salary has gone up just 16 percent but
the average college tuition and fees has
gone up
213 leaving the average college graduate
with between 38
000 and 50 000 in college debt and
approximately 20 percent of the people

Apple IBM and Tesla have all removed the
